json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">
<prop type="array" name="groupIds">

command.name: delete
command.confirmation: Are you sure you want to perform this operation?

help.short: The number of days to retain the resources after deletion.

argGroup.name: Parameters
argGroup.arg: <arg type="array" var="$parameters.identity.userAssigned" options="mi-user-assigned user-assigned" hide="True" group="">

help.short: Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the set of User Assigned identities that will be used with this volume group. The key is the ARM resource identifier of the identity.
Encryption Properties describing Key Vault and Identity information
The identity to be used with service-side encryption at rest.
Resource identifier of the UserAssigned identity to be associated with server-side encryption on the volume group.
A boolean indicating whether or not Data Integrity Check is enabled

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">
<prop type="array" name="groupIds">

help.short: The number of days to retain the resources after deletion.
Gets or sets a list of key value pairs that describe the set of User Assigned identities that will be used with this volume group. The key is the ARM resource identifier of the identity.
Encryption Properties describing Key Vault and Identity information
The identity to be used with service-side encryption at rest.
Resource identifier of the UserAssigned identity to be associated with server-side encryption on the volume group.
A boolean indicating whether or not Data Integrity Check is enabled

json.schema:
<prop type="array" name="virtualNetworkRules">
<prop readOnly="True" type="array" name="privateEndpointConnections">
<prop type="array" name="groupIds">
